Ability.Description: Places a trap at the Rogue's location for 60s. When triggered, Roots up to 8 enemies in the area for 8s or until damaged. Only 1 trap can be placed at a time.

Your Fragmentation Bomb detonates all Charges on the primary target. Existing Combo Points on the target triggers Shrapnel Bomb, dealing Physical damage to surrounding enemies.

Ability.Description: Resets the cooldown on all Bombs. Causes the next 3 Bombs to have no cooldown.
